channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: C/2025 R2 (SWAN)
item.description: C/2025 R2 (SWAN), formerly known as SWAN25B, is a long-period comet discovered on 11 September 2025 by Vladimir Bezugly through SWAN imagery. As of 26 September 2025, the comet has an apparent magnitude of +6.0 with a solar elongation of 30 degrees and is observable near Mars in 50 mm (2.0 in) binoculars. It is better seen from the Southern hemisphere.
